linkOverview

class WorkerAppModule { }

linkDescription

The ng module for the worker app side.

linkAnnotations

@NgModule({ providers: [ BROWSER_SANITIZATION_PROVIDERS, Serializer, {provide: DOCUMENT, useValue: null}, {provide: ClientMessageBrokerFactory, useClass: ClientMessageBrokerFactory_}, {provide: ServiceMessageBrokerFactory, useClass: ServiceMessageBrokerFactory_}, WebWorkerRendererFactory2, {provide: RendererFactory2, useExisting: WebWorkerRendererFactory2}, {provide: ON_WEB_WORKER, useValue: true}, RenderStore, {provide: ErrorHandler, useFactory: errorHandler, deps: []}, {provide: MessageBus, useFactory: createMessageBus, deps: [NgZone]}, {provide: APP_INITIALIZER, useValue: setupWebWorker, multi: true}, ], exports: [ CommonModule, ApplicationModule, ] })
